content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please set up your email signature - EPAM electronic signature is required for all official email correspondence. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":27538,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e892abde-0572-4a20-ad01-12db9c9c0f1e/signature.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e892abde-0572-4a20-ad01-12db9c9c0f1e/signature.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"signature.png\",\"name\":\"signature.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"e892abde-0572-4a20-ad01-12db9c9c0f1e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":621,\"height\":207},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"position\":\"relative\",\"display\":\"inline-block\",\"max-width\":\"100%\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"position\":\"relative\",\"display\":\"inline-block\",\"max-width\":\"100%\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To customize your signature, please use \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://signature.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Signature Generator\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
